name: DCoGeoMakeHappyBaby
author: DCo

sections.description:
Easily add location information or have your location information updated automatically.

  • Add location information from a street address.
  • Update geo information from geo_long and geo_lat meta keys. (Helpful for completing geo information from a WordPress mobile app).
sections.installation: Download or add the plugin to your WordPress installation. It’ll now be available. That’s all.
sections.faq:
How does it work?

It uses Google’s Geocoding API, taking in a street address and churning longitude, latitude, country and zip code.

What if I already have longitude and latitude in there?

If, for instance, you’ve already have longitude and latitude (from, say, a WordPress mobile app), then DCoGeoMakeHappyBaby will add more complete geo information.

The plugin will know if you have already put in longitude and latitude into your custom meta keys and reverse geocode to grab street address, country and zip code.

What’s with all the whimsy?

I cannot answer that. I’m bashful.

short_description: A simple Wordpress plugin to add location information to posts.
description:
Easily add location information or have your location information updated automatically.

  • Add location information from a street address.
  • Update geo information from geo_long and geo_lat meta keys. (Helpful for completing geo information from a WordPress mobile app).

screenshots.caption: The basic interface of DCoGeoMakeHappyBaby. You put in a street address and it'll grab more information for you.
